column1: in memory of nelson skipper -- lucas memorial chapel| nelson skipper. september 14
column11: with a host of family & friends. funeral services 2:00 p. m. sat.
column12: june 13th at lucas memorial chapel 9010 garfield blvd. in garfield hts. where family will receive friends one-half hour prior to service. interment 12:00 pm monday at evergreen memorial park. visitation: friday
